A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just don't care about Star Wars anymore.  The franchise really has failed to give any truly fresh perspectives.  It always has been about the Struggle between good and bad\, the dark and the light.  I understood that after the first few movies.  They continue to fail at developing an interesting and complete mythos of the force.  If this how the francise will continue...this one should have been titled: Star Wars: The Last Movie.
